comment: Raw and caramel flavors. Smells like baked goods a little.
Super aggressive grain flavor right off the bat, light spices come after. Good rich body helps with the power of the flavor. Chocolate comes in on the tail.
Fruit forward with a lightly sweet finish
Smooth with a spicy finish. Caramel flavor.
Not an aficionado with whiskey, but I drink it neat and this was very smooth
Unique and different. Worth a try. Not something I would go back to often but it’s always fun to explore new flavor profiles.
Rich and inviting on each level. Aged 3 years and it shows. A dangerously sessionable neat sip. Rich, syrupy honey.

Actually enjoying this. Definitely has some young heat to it (that settles down with a splash of water). The barrel taste is strong, which might put folks off, but I enjoy it this time of year. Not a ton of complexity, but woody with vanilla and caramel. A nice linger after the final sip.
Hot yes sweet yes metal finish?
very hot, not very complex. Nutty flavored maybe. @silverelizard this is the one we had at the chocolate tasting.
